lead_paragraph: Clint Dempsey returned to haunt Robert Green in their first meeting since the England goalkeeper's World Cup blunder, scoring in Fulham's 1-1 tie at West Ham in the Premier League.
snippet: Clint Dempsey returned to haunt Robert Green in their first meeting since the England goalkeeper's World Cup blunder, scoring in Fulham's 1-1 tie at West Ham in the Premier League.
